Actually, Dcoburn, I responded to Decadel with DevilDuer, and even 
returned fire. Oh, and Oblitertron is no where near the Ark. He's 
almost right next to the Alliance base. Do you want to rewrite your 
post, or did your chars fly to the Alliance base in one post?

::Ramulus::

Ramulus' eyes narrow as Prebon flies off. That was strange... Very 
strange, indeed. Prebon seemed to be almost desperate to give up 
Spears, and he would probably have known that he wasn't worth Striker 
in the first place. Ramulus frowns, a plan forming in his mind.

Lost in thought, it takes Ramulus a few seconds to realize Brix was 
adressing him.

"Wha?" he says, shaking out of his trance, "No, we don't go attack. 
I've got a better idea."

He walks back to the remaining functional computer panel, inserting a 
disk and downloading the results of the chip scans. He turns to look 
at Brix and Fliq.

"You two stay here in case of an attack. I got to take care of 
something."

Ramulus transforms into beast mode, galloping off at full speed for 
the Cybertronian Fire.
